channel.title: Sfinder Parameter on
channel.description: Recent content in Sfinder Parameter on

item.title: Fumen
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} Fumen is a board editor made by knewjade.

item.title: Parameter: Patterns
item.description: header{max-width: 700px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); padding: 0 2em;} body{display: flex; justify-content: center;} .singlePage{width: -webkit-fill-available; max-width: 700px;} The –patterns parameter for [[sfinder/|solution-finder]] is one of the harder parameters to understand.
